release.action: Implementation moves to Apache, and becomes part of the Cornerstone project. Interfaces (API) stay at oss.perforce.co.uk.
Beanshell updated to 1.2b1, Avalon updated to version of the 18th Aug version. Upgraded Decorators (OYOAHA and Skin). Control Panel and Configlets introduced.

Beanshell updated to 1.1alpha8, Avalon updated to version of the 22nd May version (post 4.0beta1). New applications JCDSee, JFileManager. Separation of Jesktop and it's dependant applications. Revamped JDK Demos. New Decorator (using OYOAHA look and feel). New version of Ant. Launch of jesktopapps.sourceforge.net website.
Beanshell updated to alpha5, Avalon updated to tonight's version.
FrimbleDemo3 started - Java Web Start Compatible
XBrowser Complete and indexed from website. Lots of thanks to Armond for his help.

Frimble changed again. JFrimble (at Armonds suggestion) being extendible makes app coding easier. William has made changes to clock to facilitate geater efforts. Concept of single instance app introduced. Developer docs forked off into their own book.
Frimble changed. JFrimbleDialog class instead of makeJDialog() method. Should only affect uses of JDialog. Suggestion of Armond Avanes - lead developer of XBrowser.
Beanshell upgraded to version 1.1alpha4 from 1.0beta. New .bsh scripts to interact with Jesktop.
Jipe and JPad added as new ported applications.
